channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: how do i change what is written on quest tab>

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @hell_boi hell boi
item.description:
@hell_boi wrote:

it doesnt work properly!

this is the code in client.java

it normallly says thank you for choosing project czar

this is the code in client.java
public void loadothers()
{
sendQuest(" Clue debug", 6288);
sendQuest(“Off”, 6289);
sendQuest(“On”, 6290);
}

public void loadquestinterface()
{
sendQuest("@whi@Project Czar", 640);
sendQuest("@whi@commands",663);
sendQuest("", 682);
/Free Quests/

{
sendQuest("@gre@::verac", 7332);
}

{

}

}

sendQuest("@whi@Good time on our server =)", 7336);
}
